column5: Going to Lost Island near Hudson 1st week of August. Anyone know if there are any smallies in the area worth targeting that time of year. Any tips, techniques or spots would be awesome. Wanna mix it up a little with walleye fishing. Thanks for any replies. Joe

I know they get some good smallmouth around there. Give the owner Shane a call, he will be able to tell you exactly where they are at that time of year. His son, Sam can help you out too, he is constantly on the water during the season.
